effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Speed by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Speed by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user cloaks itself with flame and
attacks. Building up more power,
it raises the user’s Speed stat.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user cloaks itself with flame and
attacks. Building up more power,
it raises the user’s Speed stat.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks. Then,
building up more power, the user raises its
Speed stat.
